verses.verse: And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Shittim <S%H7851><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to commit whoredom <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And they called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bowed down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> to their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> joined <S%H6775><s%> <S%H8735><s%> himself unto Baalpeor <S%H1187><s%>: and the anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and hang them up <S%H3363><s%> <S%H8685><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> against the sun <S%H8121><s%>, that the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> may be turned away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> that were joined <S%H6775><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto Baalpeor <S%H1187><s%>.

And, behold, one <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%> a Midianitish woman <S%H4084><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, who were weeping <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And when Pinchas <S%H6372><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, he rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a javelin <S%H7420><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>;

And he went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> into the tent <S%H6898><s%>, and thrust <S%H1856><s%> <S%H8799><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them through, the man <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the woman <S%H802><s%> through <S%H413><s%> her belly <S%H6897><s%>. So the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And those that died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> in the plague <S%H4046><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Pinchas <S%H6372><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, hath turned <S%H7725><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, while he was zealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for my sake <S%H7068><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, that I consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8765><s%> not the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.
Wherefore say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, Behold, I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto him my covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>:

And he shall have it, and his seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, even the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> Kohenhood <S%H3550><s%>; because <S%H834><s%> he was zealous <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Yisra'ELite <S%H376><s%> that was slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8716><s%>, even that was slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8717><s%> with the Midianitish woman <S%H4084><s%>, was Zimri <S%H2174><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Salu <S%H5543><s%>, a prince <S%H5387><s%> of a chief <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> among the SHim`onites <S%H8099><s%>.

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Midianitish <S%H4084><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> that was slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8716><s%> was Cozbi <S%H3579><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zur <S%H6698><s%>; he was head <S%H7218><s%> over a people <S%H523><s%>, and of a chief <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in Midian <S%H4080><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Vex <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Midianites <S%H4084><s%>, and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them:

For they vex <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you with their wiles <S%H5231><s%>, wherewith they have beguiled <S%H5230><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%>, and in the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Cozbi <S%H3579><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of a prince <S%H5387><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, their sister <S%H269><s%>, which was slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8716><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the plague <S%H4046><s%> for Peor's <S%H6465><s%> sake <S%H1697><s%>.
